comment.author: 38719851@N04
comment._content: Good photo I invite the group / Bona foto et convido al grup - Black Cat / Gat negre

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: Picture most likely taken from the roof or bell towers of Chihuahua City's cathedral, towards Plaza de Armas and City Hall.  To the left Libertad Street is seen.  The three-storied building, to the left, is Hotel Palacio.  On the middle background, Governor's Palace is seen.
